location: Accredited in Indiana, owner based in California
mission: Help working professionals transition into tech careers through practical, time-efficient learning paths

demographics.typical_background: Professional with 5-10 years in another field
demographics.constraints: Limited time (1-3 hours/day), family obligations, financial pressure

programs.name: Dev30
programs.format: Self-paced with live Zoom office hours
programs.description: 30-day JavaScript fundamentals program designed to convert students into the full bootcamp

focus_areas.description: Complete JavaScript fundamentals using self-paced curriculum and live Zoom office hours
Daily podcast (~5 mins) to feed your coding brain for each of the 30 days
Build life-changing routines balancing work and rest
Learn in public by posting on LinkedIn daily alongside cohort members

programs.upsell: Graduates get $1,400 off the full Parsity Bootcamp

programs.name: Parsity Bootcamp
programs.format: Online with dedicated mentor, project-based learning
programs.description: Full-stack coding bootcamp covering MERN + Testing + AI integration

programs.name: AIDev
programs.format: Asynchronous lessons + 4 live group office hours + weekly guest speakers (or self-paced, asynchronous lessons)
programs.description: Intensive bootcamp for web developers to master applied AI development

curriculum.week_1: LLM fundamentals, embeddings, vectors, vector search mechanics, math intuition
curriculum.week_2: RAG pipeline construction (scraping, chunking, embedding, retrieval)
curriculum.week_3: TypeScript & Next.js integration, chat interfaces, API routes, streaming, model fine-tuning
curriculum.week_4: Agent design, unit testing, deployment to Vercel, capstone RAG system

programs.capstone: Production-ready Next.js + TypeScript app with vector storage, RAG pipeline, OpenAI API, multi-agent orchestration, and real-time streaming

revenue_model.aidev: $1,997 specialized program (or $399/month x 3) OR self-paced for $1,197

value_proposition.core_message: Clear, proven roadmap from beginner to hired developer without quitting your job
differentiation: Respects time constraints of working professionals
Focus on practical skills over theory

content_pillars.description: Roadmaps, timelines, and realistic expectations for transitioning to tech
Practical coding tutorials focused on real-world applications
Soft skills and career advice for developers
Real examples of career changers who successfully transitioned
